name: Rangreza 2023
title: Rangreza 2023
about: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences hosted its annual college fest, Rangreza, from 28-10-2023 to 29-10-2023. The event aimed to provide a platform for students to showcase their talents, creativity, and enthusiasm while fostering a sense of community and camaraderie among the student body.
description: A special highlight of the event was the presence of a celebrity guest, who interacted with the students, shared anecdotes from their career journey, and inspired them to pursue their dreams with passion and dedication. Rangreza - College Fest 2023 was a resounding success, bringing together students, faculty, and staff in a celebration of talent, creativity, and community spirit. The event provided a platform for students to showcase their skills, learn from experts, and forge lasting friendships and memories.
subtitle: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences

name: Dusshera 2023
title: Dusshera 2023
about: On the auspicious occasion of Dussehra, celebrated on 23rd October 2023, the campus of Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences resonated with joyous festivities and traditional fervor. Dussehra, also known as Vijayadashami, marks the victory of good over evil and is celebrated with great enthusiasm across India.
description: Cultural programs and performances enriched the festive atmosphere, showcasing vibrant dances, melodious music, and theatrical presentations that depicted mythological stories associated with Dussehra. Students enthusiastically participated in these events, displaying their talents and creativity while reinforcing cultural values.A highlight of the event was the distribution of prasad among the attendees, fostering a sense of unity and communal harmony among students, faculty, and staff. The spirit of Dussehra, characterized by joy, positivity, and the spirit of unity, permeated throughout the celebration.
subtitle: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences

name: Poster Presentation
title: Poster Presentation
about: On August 25, 2023, Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences organized a Poster Presentation Event, providing a platform for students to showcase their innovative projects. The event aimed to foster academic excellence, and promote scholarly communication among students and faculty members.
description: Outstanding poster presentations were recognized and awarded based on merit and innovation. Participants who demonstrated exceptional research skills, creativity, and scientific consistency were acknowledged for their contributions. Certificates were presented to winners during a closing ceremony, honouring their achievements and inspiring others to pursue excellence in research.
subtitle: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences

name: Hospital Visit 2023 - CMI
title: Hospital Visit 2023 - CMI
about: The visit to CMI Hospital organized by the Pharmacy Department of Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences on August 17, 2023, was a valuable learning experience for students, providing them with first-hand exposure to hospital pharmacy practices and interdisciplinary healthcare collaboration. It allowed students to gain practical insights into the role of pharmacists in patient care and medication management within a clinical setting, further enriching their education and preparing them for future careers in pharmacy practice.
description: The objective of the CMI Hospital Visit organized by Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences is to provide students with a practical understanding of the healthcare system and pharmaceutical practices within a hospital setting. Through this visit, students will gain insights into various aspects of patient care, pharmacy management, and the role of pharmacists in a clinical setting. Additionally, the event aims to foster networking opportunities between students and professionals in the healthcare industry, encouraging collaboration and learning beyond the classroom.
subtitle: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences

name: Dengue awareness Rally
title: Dengue awareness Rally
about: The Dengue Awareness Rally organized by NSS section of Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences in Jhajra was a commendable initiative aimed at raising awareness about dengue fever and promoting preventive measures. Through the rally, participants effectively disseminated information to the community, empowering them to take proactive steps to prevent the spread of dengue. The event exemplified the college's commitment to community health and disease prevention, and it highlighted the importance of collective action in combating public health challenges like dengue fever.
description: The objective of the Dengue awareness rally organized by Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences on 1-08-2023 is to educate the community about the prevention, symptoms, and treatment of dengue fever. The rally aims to raise awareness about the importance of eliminating mosquito breeding sites and promoting preventive measures to reduce the incidence of dengue infections in the local area.
subtitle: Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences

name: Farewell 2023

name: Swachhata Abhiyaan
title: Swachhata Abhiyaan
about: The NSS team of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, organized a Swachhata Abhiyaan event on 15th August 2019 to commemorate the spirit of cleanliness and hygiene. The event aimed to foster a sense of responsibility towards cleanliness among students and promote the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan initiated by the Government of India.
description: The Swachhata Abhiyaan event organized by Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, was a resounding success, garnering active participation and enthusiasm from students, faculty, and staff alike. Through various activities such as clean-up drives, awareness campaigns, poster-making competitions, and plantation drives, the event effectively promoted the ideals of cleanliness, hygiene, and environmental stewardship. It underscored the college's commitment to fostering a culture of responsibility toward maintaining a clean and sustainable environment. Such initiatives not only contribute to the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan but also nurture a sense of civic consciousness and social responsibility among the youth, thereby paving the way for a cleaner and greener future.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun

name: World Environment Day
title: World Environment Day
about: The NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, organized a series of events to commemorate World Environment Day on June 5, 2019. The event aimed to raise awareness about environmental issues and promote sustainable practices among students and the community.The day began with an inaugural ceremony, during which the significance of World Environment Day was highlighted, and the objectives of the event were discussed.
description: Overall, the World Environment Day celebration organized by the NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, was a resounding success. It succeeded in raising awareness, engaging students in environmental conservation activities, and fostering a sense of responsibility towards the environment among participants. The event demonstrated the collective commitment of the college community toward protecting and preserving our planet for future generations.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun

name: WORLD NO TOBACCO DAY
title: WORLD NO TOBACCO DAY
about: The NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, organized a successful event to commemorate World No Tobacco Day on May 31, 2019. The event aimed to raise awareness about the harmful effects of tobacco consumption and promote tobacco cessation among students and the community.
description: In conclusion, the World No Tobacco Day event organized by the NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, effectively raised awareness about the harmful effects of tobacco and encouraged tobacco cessation among students and the community. It served as a significant step towards creating a tobacco-free environment and promoting the well-being of individuals.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun

name: Literacy programs
title: Literacy programs
about: The Literacy Program organized by the NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, on 07-01-2019, was a resounding success, achieving its objectives and leaving a positive impact on all participants.
description: In conclusion, the Literacy Program organized by the NSS Wing was instrumental in raising awareness about the importance of literacy, engaging students in community service, and empowering individuals through education. It served as a testament to the college's commitment to social responsibility and its dedication to fostering a culture of learning and empowerment.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun

name: Tree Plantations and Conservations
title: Tree Plantations and Conservations
about: On November 22, 2018, Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, organized a Tree Plantation and Conservation event under the NSS wing to promote environmental sustainability and raise awareness about the importance of preserving our natural resources. The event brought together students, faculty members, and local community members to contribute towards a greener and healthier environment.
description: The event fostered a sense of environmental responsibility among the participants, motivating them to become ambassadors for sustainability in their communities.The Tree Plantation and Conservation event organized by Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun, served as a significant step towards fostering environmental consciousness and promoting sustainable living practices. Through collective efforts, the event not only contributed to the greening of the college campus but also inspired individuals to actively participate in conservation activities for a better and greener tomorrow.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun

name: Youth Awakening Day
title: Youth Awakening Day
about: The NSS Wing of Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun organized the Youth Awakening Day on October 15, 2018, to inspire and empower young minds to actively engage in addressing societal issues. The event witnessed enthusiastic participation from students across various disciplines.
description: The event concluded with a pledge-taking ceremony, where participants vowed to actively contribute to societal welfare and uphold the values of compassion, empathy, and inclusivity. It marked the beginning of a journey towards collective action and positive change, as the youth pledged to be torchbearers of social transformation.
subtitle: Kukreja Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Dehradun
